short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your favorite publications everywhere. Download the mobile aplication from Google Play.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Favorite Publications allows you to have all your favorite websites in one place and organized into sections. But that's not all. The sections and publications can be uploaded to the cloud and then downloaded to other devices.

Favorite Publications is the solution to have all the newspapers, magazines and more in one place and on multiple devices.
